Bush

public Bush(EvolutionWorld w)
Bushes.

Parameters:
EvolutionWorld - w The World the bush is in.
double - n How many nutrients does the bush need before it grows.
w - How much water does the bush need before it can grow.
int - timeEaten How many times the bush can be eaten before it shrinks in size from maxNutritionLevel (as defined above).
